data.headline: UX Designer and Researcher
data.summary: Experienced UX designer and academic researcher with a passion for creating user-centric digital experiences. Proficient in a range of design methodologies and research techniques, with a strong focus on data-driven decision making and continuous improvement.

experience.title: UX Researcher
bullets: Conducted user research and usability testing to inform the design of various university web applications and digital services.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to translate research insights into design solutions and iterative improvements.
Presented research findings and design recommendations to stakeholders, fostering data-driven decision making.

experience.company: Fraunhofer Institute for Open Communication Systems
experience.title: UX Designer
bullets: Designed and prototyped user interfaces for various research projects, focusing on usability and accessibility.
Conducted user interviews, contextual inquiries, and usability testing to gather insights and validate design decisions.
Collaborated with researchers and developers to ensure seamless integration of UX principles into the product development process.

projects.name: Adaptive User Interfaces for Elderly Users
projects.description: Designed and evaluated a personalized user interface for elderly users, incorporating principles of inclusive design and accessibility.

projects.name: Virtual Reality for Collaborative Design
projects.description: Developed a VR-based platform for remote collaboration in product design, focusing on enhancing spatial awareness and communication.
